title: new game mode???
body:
HEY
just thinking if we should make a new game mode

i have no ideas but hoping you do 

if you don't was a new game mode and want a new one back suck as URF mode vote that in ploe

replies.body: I would love if a version of ultimate bravery became a game mode - where you might be able to pick your champion, but the game would forcibly buy whatever the build order demanded, would disable runes and would set masteries as per the build.
I recommend that a higher difficulty bots should be enabled ones that jg, ward, sweep, DON'T BUY THE 3 MIN STEALTH WARDS Riot fix your bots please but make them more difficult?

> [{quoted}](name=zingkingss2,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=HWqf00gZ,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-12-15T02:10:11.507+0000)

> if you don't was a new game mode and want a new one back suck as URF mode vote that in ploe

Try again
